# GRAPHICS::SET_PARTICLE_FX_NON_LOOPED_COLOUR

## Summary
Sets the colour tint of the next non looped particle effect

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** colR
* **FLOAT** colG
* **FLOAT** colB

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
only works on some fx's, not networked
